    level="1"

>
[Blast Resistance](/Feats.aspx?ID=3285) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 200 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Access**
You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.

</column>

---

You're used to the clamor of steel, the crack of a firearm, and the thunderous blast of explosions. You gain resistance 3 to [sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147). If you roll a success on a saving throw against an [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) effect that causes the [deafened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=8) condition, you get a critical success instead.
